data.actual_result: - The red line doesn't disappear until you enter in a space or type in more words.
data.expected_result: Upon correcting the misspelt word, the red line should immediately disappear
data.short_description: Red line of misspelt words still shows after correcting it
data.steps_to_repro: - Type in a misspelt word such as `tesr` - Right click on the word and choose one of the correct words such as `test` - Observe
